casebody.data:
STATE of Missouri, Respondent,
v.
Damien Baker SHAW, Appellant. WD 80321 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: January 30, 2018 Julia E. Neidhardt, Jefferson City, MO, for respondent. Christian Lehmberg, Columbia, MO, for appellant. Before Division Three: Gary D. Witt, Presiding Judge, Lisa White Hardwick, Judge and Edward R. Ardini, Jr., Judge

ORDER

Per curiam:

Damien Shaw ("Shaw") appeals his conviction for armed criminal action, section 571.015, in conjunction with his conviction for attempted robbery in the first-degree, section 569.020. His sole point on appeal alleges that armed criminal action cannot be predicated on an attempt offense. We affirm. For reasons explained more fully in a memorandum provided to the parties, we affirm. Rule 30.25(b).
